price: “Ne”, odgovoriše, “ali mi smo upamtili pretke naše kako tako postupaju.”
arabic: قَالُواْ بَلۡ وَجَدۡنَآ ءَابَآءَنَا كَذَٰلِكَ يَفۡعَلُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qālū bal wajadnā ābāanā kadhālika yafʿalūna
